name: UI Improvements
description: Added skeleton loading animation to the app.
Improved performance of the app.
Updated UI of the app.

name: Manifest Update
description: Updated the manifest file of the app.
Changed some colors.
Added some space in the more options menu, differentiating the options.
UI Improvements.

name: Added Restore option
description: Changed the icon of the app.
You can now restore all of your routines data from backup file.

name: Added Backup option
description: You can now backup all of your routines data to your device.

name: Performance
description: Improved overall performance.

name: UI & Performance
description: Added All routines popup view.
Improved performance of the app.

name: Performance
description: Performance improvements of the Routine popup view.

name: UI & Bug Fix
description: Some bug fixes.
Added popup routine view.

name: UI & Performance
description: Some bug fixes.
UI Improvements.

name: UI & Performance
description: Performance improvements in the main core.
Newly added routines shows on the top of the list.
New UI of Routines list.
Shows Routines days with colors in weekly routines.
Added more colors for each day in a week.
Added dots in the calendar for holidays or events.
Added support for Holiday type and Event type routines.
Added more Routines in routines store.
Added send feedback option.
Fixed Search Routine Bug.

name: UI Improvements
description: Added stylish modal alert to the app.

name: UI UX Improvements
description: Added popup alert if there is no routine.

name: Deleted expired routines
description: Now expired routines will be deleted automatically.

name: UI Improvements
description: Added stylish loading spinner to the app.

name: UI UX Improvements
description: Now shows the link to go to routine store in the home screen if there is no routine in the list.

name: UI and More Emojis
description: Added more emojis to the app.
Changed the style of the button 'Show More' in home screen.

name: UX Improvements
description: Changed some text in the home screen.

name: UI Improvements
description: Added variable fonts.
Changed the more icon in the bottom navigation bar.
Improved performance of the app.

name: UX Improvements
description: Added No Routines Text if there is no routine in the list.

name: UI Improvements
description: Added a thin border to the routines from the list.

name: Added Tags
description: Added hashtag to routine subsections in the description.

name: UI Improvements
description: Added `Our Team` Section in the app.
Some UI changes.

name: Bug Fix
description: Fixed Daily routine end time bug.

name: Added Routine store and manager
description: Added routine manager.
Added Routine store.

name: UI Improvements
description: Changed the button of seeing more routines in the home screen.
Made Better Ui for the app.
Added text ellipses to longer title and description in routines.

name: Smoother
description: Fixed scroll to top in new routine screen when you open it.
Added 'Made by' watermark to the app.
you can disable it from settings.
Fixed header shadow now showing in the calendar screen in dark mode.
Removed app link changed notes from the loading screen
Performance improvements.

name: Smooth UI
description: Added header shadow to headers when scrolled with the help of IntersectionObserver.
Added smooth scroll to the app.
Added a back button in header in 'New Routine' screen.
Now confirm dialog is shown when you try to discard a routine from 'New Routine' screen.

name: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed changelog not showing up bug.

name: New UI
description: Added a new UI to the app.
Added a new icon to the app.
Changed main color of the app.
Added changelog screen to the app.
Search bar is sticky now.
You can see it by clicking on 'See full changelog' from More options.
Added loading screen to the app.
Fixed 'System Default' dark mode bug.

name: Dark Theme
description: Added a dark theme to the app.

name: A lot of changes
description: A lot of changes were made to the app.

name: First Release
description: First release of the app.
